step_data.thought:
I need to check the current state of the page after clicking the 'Reverse Directions' button. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see:

1. The 'From' textbox (ID 158) has the value '40.7570, -73.9860'
2. The 'To' textbox (ID 163) has the value '40.7828, -73.9654'

These are the coordinates for Times Square and Central Park respectively. The directions table is showing the route from Times Square to Central Park (as indicated by the steps like starting on 7th Avenue, turning onto West 43rd Street, etc.).

This confirms that the directions have been successfully reversed. The route now goes from Times Square (the original destination) to Central Park (the original starting point). My task has been completed successfully, so I should inform the user.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully reversed the directions. The route now goes from Times Square, New York to Central Park, New York.')
